body: Does anyone know When the entries are opened https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

replies.body: I don't have any new information or updates on the PBE beyond that post or what's provided on the[ PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Be sure to bookmark that for any updates as maintenance continues.  Hang tight!
